Overview.content:
In OpenCms you can build multilingual websites easily. Starting with an unilingual website, the tutorial tells you how to add localizations.

There are two ways to add localizations:

  • The multi-tree approach: That means, each translation of the website has it's own folder tree. This way localizations of the site can diverge in content and structure.
  • The single-tree approach: That means, we keep the single folder tree of the unilingual site and make it accessible in various locales.

The tutorial covers both approaches. You can decide which approach you choose. Both have their pros and cons that are briefly discussed as well.
